home.intro: As a Computer Engineering student at Gazi University, I develop user-friendly and innovative solutions with modern web technologies. I am a software developer specialized in the React, Next.js, and Node.js ecosystem. I also have experience in artificial intelligence and machine learning projects. I work on game development with Unity and data analysis with Python. I am always focused on learning and improving myself.
home.welcomeDesc: I develop modern and scalable solutions in web, mobile, and AI fields. I combine up-to-date technologies and best software practices to produce user-oriented, innovative projects.
home.frontendDesc: I design and develop fast, secure, and seamless user interfaces for all devices using React, Next.js, and Angular.
home.backendDesc: I build high-performance, secure, and scalable backend services and APIs using .NET Core and Node.js.
home.aiDesc: I develop AI models that provide smart and efficient solutions to real-world problems using TensorFlow and modern machine learning tools.
home.contactDesc: Contact me for modern, innovative, and sustainable software solutions that will add value to your projects. We can achieve great things together!

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Software developer and computer engineering student
about.bio1: Hello! I'm Ferhat Bozkurt, a Computer Engineering student at Gazi University. Since starting this journey in 2020, I've always been excited by the dynamic and ever-evolving nature of the software world. I focus on constantly improving myself in modern web technologies, artificial intelligence, and mobile application development.
about.bio2: During my university education, I participated in various projects to put my theoretical knowledge into practice. I developed corporate projects using React, Next.js, and .NET Core in full-stack web development. I produced cross-platform solutions by working with React Native in mobile application development. On the backend, I gained experience in microservice architecture and modern database management systems.
about.bio3: My interest in artificial intelligence and machine learning led me to develop various projects using TensorFlow and deep learning technologies. Especially the reinforcement learning project I developed in the field of energy management further increased my passion in this area.
about.bio4: While working as a freelance software developer, I gained valuable experience in communicating with clients from different sectors and project management. I also strive to be a part of the global software community by contributing to open source projects. I am always eager to learn new technologies and use them to solve real-world problems.
about.interest1: Web Technologies and Modern Frontend Frameworks
about.interest2: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Applications
about.goal2: Contribute more to open source projects
about.goal3: Take an active role in technology communities

skills.iskurDesc: During my internship at İŞKUR Headquarters IT Department, I actively participated in the corporate software development cycle. I observed how software development processes are managed in government institutions. I gained hands-on experience in data security, user access management, and workflow automation.
skills.appDevDesc: I took part in software projects developed for public institutions and private sector clients. I played an active role in full-stack application development processes using Angular and .NET Core technologies. I gained practical experience in UI design, API development, database management, and debugging. I was involved in all stages of the software lifecycle from requirements analysis to testing.
skills.b2bDesc: We are developing a platform that facilitates B2B trade as a team. We are developing a mobile application with React Native. The system includes matching algorithms, user panels, and offer management modules. I played an active role in project management and solution-oriented teamwork.
skills.graduateDesc: I am working voluntarily on the development of our school's graduate network platform. I gained experience in teamwork and project management.
skills.graduationDesc: We are developing smart home systems using IoT technologies. We produce solutions focused on energy efficiency and user experience.
skills.freelanceProject1: Stock and Sales Management System (.NET & Angular)
skills.educationFocus1: Focused on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
skills.educationFocus2: Web Development and Mobile Application projects
